profile.name: Daishi Kato
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Freelancer | Tokyo
profile.summary: Highly motivated and experienced software engineer with a passion for building scalable, performant, and maintainable applications. Proficient in a range of technologies including Node.js, React, Redux, and IPFS.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Designed and developed multiple high-performance applications using Node.js, React, and Redux.
Collaborated with clients to understand project requirements and delivered custom solutions.
Maintained and improved existing codebases to ensure scalability and maintainability.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed multiple web applications using React, Redux, and Node.js.
Worked on open-source projects such as IPFS Pubsub room and Excalidraw.
Participated in benchmarking Node.js performance and created a tool for Working From Home.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained the IPFS Pubsub room repository and ensured its stability and security.
Contributed to discussions on GitHub and provided feedback on pull requests.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed multiple web applications using React, Redux, and Node.js.
Worked on benchmarking Node.js performance and created a tool for Working From Home.
